The Fruit of the Loom women’s comfort front close sport bra is one of our best sellers. The soft cotton fabric is light and breathable and the front close design insures stay in place straps an active lifestyle requires a brand that can give support and comfort. Fruit of the Loom has been a leader in affordable undergarments for more that 160 years. Our unconditional guarantee insures that you get the best product every time or your money back. So run, jump, bike, or sprint happy with Fruit of the Loom.

Fruit of the Loom

Fruit of the Loom has been one of America’s most trusted brands for over 160 years. We promise to deliver high quality, affordable undergarments always. Start everyday happy with Fruit of the Loom.

Lifestyle Bras

Sport

Our sport bras are a smart addition to anyone’s wardrobe. Whether you’re wearing it for leisure or for the gym, these bra keeps you supported while keeping a smooth appearance. An active lifestyle requires a brand that can give support and comfort.

Underwire

Our underwire bras provide you with a magical lift, while simultaneously shaping and supporting. The perfect solution for creating a natural looking shape under you everyday clothing.

Comfort

Comfort is key when it comes to your bras, that’s why our bras are constructed with soft, stretch, breathable fabric. Our assortment of styles are designed with your active lifestyle in mind.

Comfort & Support Your Way

Where function meets form. These Fruit of the Loom Bras are designed for comfort and support. They come in a range of styles, sizes and colors. They’re the prefect addition to your everyday wardrobe.

Price: $89.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 10:19:20 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Bring your home to life with our extensive range of planting products. From planters, plant hangers, plant stands, garden statues and raise beds to grow lights, we have everything a stylish plant lover needs.

Decorative products that make life more beautiful and comfortable, that’s what POTEY stands for. Create a pretty home for your plants to live in and add heaps of character to your garden with the selection of our beautiful products.

Raised Garden Bed

POTEY PLANT STAND & SHELF

POTEY Raise Beds

Create Beautiful Green Garden

【Raised Garden Bed with Greenhouse】This galvanized raised garden bed kit contains a planting bed, a greenhouse, and 2 greenhouse covers. With our perfectly matches combo set, no need to buy each of them separately, to make sure your favorite planting grows well through the whole year. POTEY raised garden beds size: 5.4 L * 1.6 W *0.8 H (FT), greenhouse cover size: 2.3 W * 2.5 H (FT).
【2 Different Use Greenhouse Cover】POTEY raised garden bed come with PE cover and PE net, PE cover used for winter, to keep warm, and prevent vegetables and plants from being affected by low temperature; PE net used for summer, to protect your vegetables and plants while ventilating.
【Innovative Soil Ventilation Holes】Creating a planting environment in a plant box is different from the natural environment, where soil respiration is vital. Our plant box is equipped with vent holes that can replace fresh oxygen, making sure the plant roots grow well and strong.
【Strong Connecting rods】In order to keep the garden box more stable, we added 2 connecting rods in the middle of the garden box. Compared to other planting beds without rods or using thin iron sheets as rods, our connecting rods are more durable and have a long service life.
【Thickened Material】Galvanized raised garden beds are made of solid steel plates galvanized layer which average thickness of galvanized sheet reaches 0.6mm, can stay in contact with the soil for a long time. If you have any problems during use, please feel free to contact us, and we will solve your problems ASAP.

POTEY Galvanized Raised Garden Bed with Greenhouse

Why Choose Potey?

Bring your home to life with our extensive range of planting products. From planters, plant hangers, plant stands, garden statues and raise beds to grow lights, we have everything a stylish plant lover needs.

Decorative products that make life more beautiful and comfortable, that’s what POTEY stands for. Create a pretty home for your plants to live in and add heaps of character to your garden with the selection of our beautiful products.

More reasons you’ll love this raised garden bed:

With Two Different Use Greenhouse Covers – The raised garden bed is equipped with a PE cover to keep plants warm in winter and prevent vegetables and plants from being affected by low temperatures; equipped with a PE net used in summer to protect plants from insects.

High-Quality Thickened Material – The raised garden bed outdoor is made of solid steel plates galvanized layer, the average thickness of galvanized sheet reaches 0.6mm, can stay in contact with the soil for a long time, and is resistant to corrosion. Maintains its original shape even after many years of use.

Easy to Installation – This planter box outdoors is easy to install, with instructions detailing every step of the product’s installation details and a clear and concise installation video to assist you with the installation.

POTEY-GARDEN BEDS KIT PACKAGING INCLUDES:
  • Straight iron sheet * 6
  • Curved iron sheet * 4
  • Connecting rod * 2
  • Installed screw * 1 （box）
  • Clamps * 8
  • PE Plant Fabric * 2
  • Greenhouse Hoops * 4
  • PVC Transparent Pipe * 3

POTEY Raised Garden Beds with Cover

Two practical protective covers

POTEY continuously optimizes its products based on market research and customer feedback; this upgraded planter boxes outdoor has 2 different greenhouse covers to meet the growing needs of plants throughout the year.

POTEY found that plant lovers would like to have their own open space to experience planting and explore plant secrets. At this time, POTEY garden beds are the best choice.

  • ADVANTAGE – Surround air vents on all sides
  • ADVANTAGE – Suitable for growing needs of any plant
  • ADVANTAGE – Reasonably sized for most usage scenarios
  • ADVANTAGE – Strong connecting rod ensures long-term stability
  • ADVANTAGE – All parts are made of more than 0.6mm metal materials

Read more

SHOW BETTER PRODUCT DETAILS

Multiple Sets of Vent Holes

  • Simulate natural land respiration
  • Make sure the soil has enough oxygen during plant growth
  • Avoid soil compaction

Metal Material

  • Galvanized
  • More than 6mm thickness
  • Overall solid steel material
  • Not easy to corrode, rust

Strong Connecting Rods

  • Ensuring that the garden bed does not deform during long-term use
  • Most garden beds do not have rods, they will deform, fall apart, and collapse under long-term soil compression

Read more

PE cover for winter warmth

The combination of the galvanized raised garden bed and the PE greenhouse cover ensures that the plants are kept warm in the cold winter, preventing the vegetables and plants from being affected by the low temperature.

PE net for summer insect control

Build a PE net outside the raised garden bed, which can not only keep the planter boxes outdoor ventilated and easily absorb water, but also protect the plants from insects.

2 Different Use Greenhouse Covers

With this perfectly matches combo set, no need to buy each of them separately, to make sure your favorite planting grows well through the whole year.

Read more

Plants can be grown in raised garden beds with greenhouse all year round to create a beautiful courtyard.

item.content:encoded:
Price: $15.94
(as of Nov 29,2022 04:40:22 UTC – Details)


Basics bras for ladies are a wardrobe essential. The Fruit of the Loom Women’s Spaghetti Strap Cotton Sports Bras can be layered under any shirt for a pop of color or additional coverage and support. These cotton pullover bras are perfect for everyday wear, designed with easily to hide spaghetti style straps and soft, stretch fabric for a comfortable and flexible fit.
Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 6.81 x 6.57 x 2.2 inches; 6 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ 9036
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ August 2, 2022
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Fruit of the Loom
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B0B8G23GYD

Imported
Pull-On closure
Machine Wash
A comfortable and lightweight alternative to an underwire bra, the Fruit of the Loom Women’s Spaghetti Strap Cotton Sports Bra includes 6 pullover sports bras perfect for everyday wear or low impact workouts. Layer the bras for added support and a strappy look.
Wire-free bras designed with soft, stretch cotton for a flexible fit plus 2-ply construction that comfortably hugs and supports while offering modesty without padding.
Cami bra style works well under low cut necklines and spaghetti bra straps hide easily under clothing.

item.title: Fruit of the Loom mens Recycled Waffle Thermal Underwear Set (Top and Bottom)
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) For the best in dual-functionality, warmth while you’re outdoors and cool comfort while you’re indoors shop this Fruit of the Loom men’s classic mid weight recycled waffle set. This top and pant set is ideal for moderately cold to cold weather conditions, so you’ll be prepared when the snow start ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $19.10
(as of Nov 29,2022 02:13:46 UTC – Details)


For the best in dual-functionality, warmth while you’re outdoors and cool comfort while you’re indoors shop this Fruit of the Loom men’s classic mid weight recycled waffle set. This top and pant set is ideal for moderately cold to cold weather conditions, so you’ll be prepared when the snow start to appear and the temperature starts to drop. These thermal crew neck top and bottoms are designed to keep you warm and protected with its waffle knit fabric that is deliciously soft and perfect for trapping in heat. Its ribbed cuffs keep the cold air out to maximize heat retention. This premium thermal set is equipped with dual defense moisture wicking technology that wicks away moisture keeping you dry all day long. Its tag-free design ensures that stitching is a thing of the past, while its sturdy flat lock seam construction guarantees you’ll get many years of wear. Be prepared for winter and make sure that this Fruit of the Loom men’s premium mid weight waffle thermal set is part of you winter wardrobe.
Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 13.54 x 10.24 x 2.09 inches; 1.03 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ WRT20931-S/20932-S
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ July 15, 2020
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Fruit of the Loom
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B08D2QWK1Y

Imported
Pull On closure
Machine Wash
Medium weight classic thermal long sleeve crew neck top and bottom made from U.S. sourced cotton and recycled polyester are ideal for moderately cold to cold conditions
